author: tross
msg: Fixed a performance regression caused by the management code.
The current/last-change timestamp is now set on management objects
when they are published, not when they actually change.  Also, the
timestamp is updated only if modifications were made to the object

author: coheigea
msg: Removing "provided" scope from opensaml dependency after discussion with Fred.
- Also removing windows new-lines introduced by an earlier commit...

author: bjreed
msg: GERONIMODEVTOOLS-536 for reading in security roles from EJB.  Thanks to Delos Dai for the patch.

author: sergeyb
msg: JAXRS : support for custom provider media types plus few other minor changes

author: sccomer
msg: csharp fix for ETCH-18: KeepAlive throws exception while trying to shutdown connection.
fixed both csharp and java versions to use Todo during wakeup to send request so as to not block AlarmManager if there is a problem with the connection.
